title: Ethereum’s Buterin Releases Roadmap Addressing Scaling, Privacy, Wallet Security
description: In his blog post, Buterin shares that the network needs to address these components simultaneously, otherwise the blockchain fails.

title: Aptos Price Prediction for 2023 – 2032: Will APT Token Hold Bullish Hopes?
description: The automatic release of new APT tokens into the open market is valued at over $50 million based on current prices. title: Crypto venture capital firm Paradigm challenges SEC’s proposed definition of “exchange”
description: Paradigm, a crypto venture capital firm, has criticized the United States Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) attempt to redefine the term “exchange” and bring decentralized exchanges (DEXs) under its regulatory scope. In a detailed 14-page letter sent to the SEC, Paradigm argued that treating DEXs as traditional exchanges is invalid and incoherent. Differences between DEXs ... Read more

title: US House introduces draft of legislation for stablecoins
description: The United States House Financial Services Committee, led by Representative Patrick McHenry, has unveiled the third draft of the stablecoin bill.

title: Robinhood to cut support for Cardano, Polygon, and Solana
description: Robinhood has announced its decision to discontinue support for cryptocurrencies Cardano, Polygon, and Solana from June 27, underscoring the growing regulatory pressures within the crypto industry.
